content: in this legal case the court of reggio calabria has made a final ruling regarding a shared property located in bagnara calabra the court has declared the property indivisible and assigned exclusive ownership to one party as a result the other party has been ordered to pay a sum of €25740 the court has also granted the plaintiffs request for payment of the propertys profits awarding them €10800 any credits or debts related to the case have been offset resulting in an obligation for one party to pay €14940 to the other the court has rejected the plaintiffs additional claims and has ordered them to pay the litigation costs of €3230 plus general expenses the court has stated that the applicable law in this case is article 720 of the civil code the ruling was made on september 30 2020

metadata.CASE_ID: Tribunale Reggio Calabria sez. II, 01/10/2020, n.849
